page.title: 09LIVING IN ROCHDALE
page.content: I live in a terraced house in Osborne Street, in Deeplish, which is a part of Rochdale. I live with my brother, my dog and my parents. The best place in my house is my bedroom which has a computer in it. There is a factory in front of my house with a big garden around it. That is private land. There are trees in front og our house blocking the view of the ugly factory. To the left of our house are some public playing fields with a park next to them. I usually play soccer on the fields, but they are not like the gardens of the factory, which are soft and cushion you when you fall. I think it is not fair, not letting me and my friends play in the grounds of the factory. B.W.
